attributes.action: Stop using plastics that are unrecyclable like black shampoo bottles
attributes.additional_details: Plastic is a horrible material and should be used as little as possible. But if plastic is used, it should be a clear or white plastic that is easy to recycle and should not be unessearily hard to recycle colours such as black or dark brown
attributes.background: I want companies to use less plastic all together but any plastic that is used just be easily recyclable and therefore must not be black. Examples of this is the black bottles used for Treseme Shampoo bottles and black packaging used for Thornton's caramel shortcakes
